meanings.sent1: Her insomnia kept her awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with insomnia after he couldn't sleep for days.
meanings.sent3: Even counting sheep couldn't cure her insomnia.
meanings.sent4: His insomnia was like a stubborn shadow, never leaving him in peace.
meanings.sent5: The haunting presence of insomnia made her dread bedtime.

meanings.definition: Chronic inability to fall asleep or remain asleep for an adequate amount of time
meanings.sent1: His chronic insomnia affected his daily life.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with insomnia every single night.
meanings.sent3: The insomnia monster seemed to dance around his bed, mocking his attempts to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The weight of insomnia pressed down on her like a heavy blanket, suffocating her rest.
meanings.sent5: The relentless grip of insomnia refused to let him slip into dreams.
